title: Remove duplicate close button from grave detail card

requirements.summary: Remove one of the duplicate close buttons (X) from the GraveDetailCard modal in the top-right corner, keeping only a single close button for dismissing the card
acceptanceCriteria: Only one close button (X) appears in the top-right corner of the grave detail card modal
The remaining close button successfully closes the modal when clicked
No visual duplicates or overlapping close icons are visible

file_operations.description: Remove the duplicate close button (X) from the dialog header while preserving the DialogClose component that dismisses the modal. Inspect the component structure to identify which close button element is duplicated and remove one instance, ensuring the remaining close button maintains full dismiss functionality and proper positioning in the top-right corner.
